title: PatchTST vs LSTM: A Hands-On Benchmark for Crypto Forecasting
author: K1
summary: We benchmark PatchTST against our production LSTM on BTCUSDT, sharing setup details, early results, and the artifacts you can inspect yourself.
seo_title: PatchTST vs LSTM: Crypto Forecasting Benchmark
seo_description: A hands-on benchmark comparing PatchTST to LSTM for crypto forecasting. See the setup, metrics, and artifacts for BTCUSDT predictions.
seo_keywords: PatchTST vs LSTM, crypto forecasting benchmark, BTCUSDT transformer model, time series transformer, LSTM baseline crypto
